title: The Best Fruits in Blox Fruit Ranked

steps.title: Awakened Buddha
steps.content: Awakened Buddha It’s hard to pick a favorite, but we’re going with the awakened version of Buddha here—it allows you to transform into a large Buddha form that's tankier and able to use swords, guns, and fighting styles. In addition to the transformation, your range for sword and fighting styles increases, and paired with the AOE moves from the Fruit, provides massive damage. You can easily solo stronger bosses, like the Cake Queen, Darkbeard , and Soul Reaper. Being harder to kill and having high damage makes Awakened Buddha the best for overall gameplay, which includes grinding, PvE, and PvP. If you're newer or don't have the Buddha Fruit yet, use Light [1] X Research source or Flame. [2] X Research source

Awakened Buddha might be our pick for the best overall, but what about the best fruit for PvE? These charts show rankings for unawakened Fruits. Fruit ranks higher if it's easy to get and use, whereas harder-to-get fruits with bigger damage are ranked lower.
Here’s how we rank the Fruits if you’re playing PvP matches. Harder to obtain Fruit with a steeper learning curve ranks lower in this chart simply because it isn't as easy for new players.

steps.title: Awakened Buddha
steps.content: Awakened Buddha You can buy Buddha from the Blox Fruit Dealer and then Awaken it by doing Buddha Raids and talking with the "Mysterious Entity" NPC. Trade 14,500 fragments to fully Awaken Buddha. Buddha is a Legendary Beast Fruit.

steps.title: Awakened Dough
steps.content: Awakened Dough Buy the Dough Fruit from the Blox Fruit Dealer, and then Awaken it by doing Dough Raids and talking with the "Mysterious Entity" NPC. Fully Awaken this Fruit with 18,500 fragments. Dough is a Mythical Elemental Fruit.

steps.title: Leopard
steps.content: Leopard Considered the 2nd most expensive, after Kitsune, this Fruit allows you to transform into a humanoid Leopard. You can purchase this Fruit from the Blox Fruit Dealer. Leopard is a Mythical Beast Fruit.

steps.title: Venom
steps.content: Venom The passive abilities are great and either create damage-over-time ticks or improve your defense, which many players love. It's a versatile Fruit that lets you switch easily between farming and PvP. Venom is a Mythical Natural Fruit.

steps.title: Awakened Magma
steps.content: Awakened Magma Purchase this Fruit from the Blox Fruit Dealer and then Awaken it with 14,500 fragments. It's one of the easier Fruits to Awaken and is widely considered the best Fruit for newer players. Magma is a Rare Elemental Fruit.

steps.title: Awakened Rumble
steps.content: Awakened Rumble Buy it from the Blox Fruit Dealer and Awaken it with 14,500 fragments. The PvP potential of this Fruit is great, with its abilities to stun, deal high amounts of damage to an entire area, and dash. Rumble is a Legendary Elemental Fruit.

steps.title: Portal
steps.content: Portal You can buy this Fruit from the Blox Fruit Dealer. This Fruit isn't about damage, but allows you to fast-travel to any island in the World Map. You can avoid damage or escape a tough fight with this Fruit. Portal is a Legendary Natural Fruit.

steps.title: Kitsune
steps.content: Kitsune Buy this Fruit from the Blox Fruit Dealer and you can transform into a Kitsune creature and carry another player on your back. This Fruit also gives you the ability to run on water and boosts your running speed and how high you can jump. Kitsune is a Mythical Beast Fruit.

steps.title: Shadow
steps.content: Shadow The Blox Fruit Dealer sells this Fruit, and it has excellent farming potential with attacks that hit more than one target. Shadow is a Mythical Natural Fruit.

steps.title: Dark
steps.content: Dark You can buy this Fruit from the Blox Fruit Dealer NPC. It allows you to ignore all physical damage if you are a certain amount of levels above the enemy. This Fruit is easy to obtain. Dark is an Uncommon Elemental Fruit.

steps.title: Magma and Buddha are the best Fruits for grinding.
steps.content: Magma and Buddha are the best Fruits for grinding. Magma is the best Fruit if you're grinding Sea Events because of the abilities that prevent you from drowning. For example, the Awakened version will allow you to walk on water. It's even a preferable Fruit to grind Sea Events without being Awakened. Even Buddha is super strong before Awakening; it lets you transform into a giant Buddha and use your weapon skills. You don't have to get a high mastery in the Fruit to use it, which makes it great for grinding and farming.

steps.title: Light and Flame are the best Fruits for grinding in the First Sea.
steps.content: Light and Flame are the best Fruits for grinding in the First Sea. Light and Flame have low mastery requirements. Light has the fastest flight in the First Sea, which makes it great for traveling between islands, and it deals a good amount of damage. Flame is cheaper and deals high damage with a low cooldown for a non-Awakened Fruit. The Second Sea has Bounties, so PvP is available. For that reason, Flame and Light are not good in the Second Sea. You're better off using Fruits that can handle grinding with random PvP, like Magma or Buddha.

steps.title: Flame, Light, and Ice are the best Fruits for beginners.
steps.content: Flame, Light, and Ice are the best Fruits for beginners. While Flame has a high-damage and low-cooldown skill, Ice allows you to walk on water, and Light gives you flight. These are all very useful skills for new players.

steps.title: Bomb is the Fruit with the highest damage.
steps.content: Bomb is the Fruit with the highest damage. It's a common Fruit and easy to get, but it's not as easy to use as the most recommended Fruits, like Magma or Buddha.

steps.title: Buy from the Blox Fruit Dealer or trade in the Café/Mansion.
steps.content: Buy from the Blox Fruit Dealer or trade in the Café/Mansion. You can find the Blox Fruit Dealer around Blox Fruits in many locations like Pirate Starter Island, Marine Starter Island, Middle Town, and Port Town. [3] X Research source This NPC sells a random assortment of Fruits, and his stock changes all the time. Trade with other players for Fruits in the Café or Mansion. If you're lucky, you can get Fruits for free if one spawns for you. If you don't pick it up, the Fruit will despawn after 20 minutes.
